title: Sun-Dried Tomato Spread
introduction: This Sun-Dried Tomato Spread adds a burst of flavor to any meal. Ideal for enhancing toasted bread or bread sticks, it also pairs wonderfully with a soft cheese like robiola or goat cheese.
instructions: Place the tomato halves in a medium bowl with warm water to cover. Let stand 10 minutes. Drain and pat dry.
In a food processor or blender, combine the tomatoes, garlic, and capers and process until chopped fine. Stir in the oil, vinegar, and a little salt. Taste and adjust seasoning.
Scrape the mixture into a bowl. Cover and let stand 1 hour before serving.
